ref: 8614 prátisarati ʻ goes round from place to place ʼ TS., ʻ rushes upon ʼ Hariv., ʻ returns home ʼ BhP. 2. pratisārayati ʻ causes to go back ʼ Car. 3. *pratisāra -- , pratisārin -- ʻ going from one to the other ʼ MBh. [NIA. forms more prob. der. from, or at least infl. by pehaṇu, paisnā < práviśati. -- √sr̥]
